thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 8 of 122
thread.title: Colin Shulver

author: Colin Shulver
title: Colin Shulver
text:
My holiday was booked with Glen Blackburn who assisted me on locations , flights etc and our travel plans . On arrival to each destination we were greeted and cared for . Glen proposed hotel Le Bua in Bangkok where we stayed 2 nights, it was a great hotel and the sky Bar was out of this world , a must to see !! The staff were great and the break-fast was very nice. Also the staff from Destination Asia who collected us from the Airports and got us to our hotels were polite , and very help-full. From Bangkok we flew to Koh Samui and stayed at the Peace Resort, the accommodation was a deluxe room and was truly wonderfull , couldn't have wished for anything more! Perfect ! the hotel bar/ restaurant was however a bit disappointing , it really needs up dating ! Food was average ! and also sunbeds could be up graded ! There are many good restaurants in Koh Samui, we tried lots would recommend Poppies , very nice Thai food , a must ! Eat at Fishermans village , great variety of restaurants ! We also went to Dining on the Rocks , this is a special treat as is expensive but truly worth it if you love fine dining and a great location !
Would recommend Dial a flight !!
